dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 41 IH: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to “Postsecondary Student Success Grant”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Clyde submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to Postsecondary Student Success Grant.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to Postsecondary Student Success Grant (89 Fed. Reg. 48517 (June 7, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
